Interface ec.id.capabilities.Telepathy

Implementing Classes:
TelepathyCapability
public abstract interface Telepathy
extends Remote
Interface defining basic Telepathy capability.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com

Method Summary
void sendTelepathy(Speech speech)
          Primary remote interface for sending us telepathy.
 

Method Detail

sendTelepathy

public void sendTelepathy(Speech speech)
                  throws RemoteException,
                         NullCapabilityException
Primary remote interface for sending us telepathy. This is the interface for receivers of this capability to use to send us telepathy. This is the entry point for all telepathy to us.
Parameters:
speech - the Speech instance to send
Throws:
RemoteException - thrown if some problem with sending
